meanings.definition: The practice of forming concepts or ideas.
meanings.sent1: In art class, we learned about conceptualism and how artists come up with new ideas.
meanings.sent2: Her conceptualism in creating a business plan impressed everyone on the team.
meanings.sent3: The children's game of creating imaginary worlds showed a fun side of conceptualism.
meanings.sent4: His conceptualism in solving complex puzzles was like a master painter creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful visuals to explain the concept of conceptualism to the students.

meanings.definition: The philosophical theory that emphasizes the mental or cognitive aspects of experience.
meanings.sent1: Studying conceptualism in philosophy class helped me understand the importance of mental processes.
meanings.sent2: The professor's lecture on conceptualism shed light on how our minds shape our perceptions.
meanings.sent3: The debate about the best flavor of ice cream turned into a deep discussion on conceptualism.
meanings.sent4: Her deep dive into the world of dreams revealed a new layer of conceptualism in psychology.
meanings.sent5: The book used relatable examples to explain the complex topic of conceptualism to beginners.
